DOC.brief_title: Study Of The Effect Of Fragmin In The Treatment Of Neuroischaemic Foot Ulcers In Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 year age type 1 type 2 diabetes . Subjects peripheral occlusive arterial disease ( PAOD ) neuropathy disability score ( NDS ) > 3 Subjects undergone vascular reconstruction angioplasty le 1 month prior randomization . Subjects ulcer grade 0 3 stag A , B D accord University Texas wound classification system . Subjects know bleed disorder evidence active bleeding .
